title: Function Composition
text: As (a $$\circ$$ $$b)(i)=a(b(i))$$, any inequalities would remain the same: $$a\left(b\left(i\right)\right)<a\left(b\left(j\right)\right)$$ is the same as (a $$\circ$$ b)(i)<(a $$\circ$$ b)(j).
